appearances.title: The Hearing Room FCC Chair Testifies at Oversight Hearing : CSPAN2 : January 15, 2026 6:19am-7:29am EST
appearances.snippet: you testified in response to a question from senator ben ray lujan that the fcc is no. an independent agency and you reiterated that point earlier today. prior to the senator's question, the fcc website, it was clear that the commission is an independent agency. but shortly after your response, this language was removed from the white house website as displayed here. chairman carr, did you decide in the middle of the hearing to officially abandon the fcc's independence or had that decision already been made by you and president trump to the hearing? this is an important conversation. so. and my question just on timing. so did you make that decision during the hearing or prior to hearing? because it was this, because the website said prior to the hearing that was an independent agency. you made a comment during the hearing and. then someone changed the website to say to make no reference to it being an independent agency. so just want the american people to know that decision already been made. when you walked into the hearing, or did you make that decision at the hearin
